function.name: get_diagram
function.description: Used to render and return images of diagram defined by input Mermaid markdown code

mc.description: A string containing Mermaid markdown coded that defines the structure and content of the diagram

ra.description: (optional): number of remaining attempts if rendering fails

function.name: get_diagram_guidelines
function.description: get the guidelines about how to write mermaid markdown code  for the diagram
